summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing shipping charges and services rendered. The invoice includes multiple shipment details, charges, and discounts applied to Epstein's account for various deliveries made in late January and early February 2005.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the primary account holder for the FedEx services detailed in the invoice, with multiple shipments listed under his name.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is mentioned as associated with Epstein's interests, receiving shipments at the same address.

persons.name: Hanna Epstein
persons.context: Hanna Epstein is mentioned as a recipient of shipments at the same address as Jeffrey E. Epstein.

persons.name: Sandra Marsh
persons.context: Sandra Marsh is mentioned in connection with a shipment sent to her management office, indicating a business relationship with Epstein.

events.title: Multiple Shipments Picked Up
events.description: Several shipments were picked up by FedEx from Epstein's address on January 28, 2005.

events.title: Shipments Delivered
events.description: Multiple shipments were delivered to Epstein's address on February 1, 2005.

events.title: Shipments Delivered
events.description: Additional shipments were delivered to Epstein's address on February 4, 2005.

keyFacts: The invoice details shipping charges totaling $1,320.26 for services rendered by FedEx.
Multiple shipments were made to and from Epstein's address, indicating frequent use of FedEx services.
Darren Indyke and Hanna Epstein are associated with Epstein's shipping activities, receiving shipments at the same address.
Sandra Marsh is mentioned in connection with a shipment, indicating a business relationship with Epstein.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge of 9.00% applied to various shipments.
